div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Sexto die mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo
nonagesimo quarto quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo Secte

Eodem die Dauid menyeis Electus fuit in officium prepositure
pro anno Instante prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die Johannes menyeis gilbertus menyeis Andreas branche
et Jacobus colisone electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum prestitis solitis
Juramentis pro anno Instante

Eodem die phillipus Dunbrek Andreas nachty thomas Jamesone
et henricus orvm electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum pro anno
Instante prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die continuatur plegium penes dimidium Rethis de furdis porrectum super Andream murray
per Dauid menyeis vsque ad feriam Sextam proximo sequente propter
debilitatem curie in similibus forma vigore et effectu sine preiudicio parcium
Insuper dicte partes consenserunt ad continuacionem dicti plegij ad dictum
dies videlicet decimam diem octobris sub spe concordie et Ab eodem si non concordes
fuerint a quindena in quindenam legittime proceden' in forma Juris

Eodem die accedens ad barram Andreas murray Junor Junior et protesta
tus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' et octo d' sibi annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram altaris Sancti Stephanj ex australi ex vna
et terram Andree branche ex boreali partibus ab altera ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam tercio die huius processus Testibus
thoma gledstane laurencio tailyouris et phillippo Dunbrek sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus Coupar et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo Redditu xiij s' et iiij d' sibi annuatim debitum
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter communiones vias regias versus oriens boriam et austrum et occidens
et le calsay inter inter terram ipsius Willelmi et Ricardi hill
versus austrum occidens ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam
tercio die huius processus Testibus Willelmo cuming scissor' Andrea
Kennarty et Andrea nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir dominus Willelmus
crukschank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaci infra
ecclesiam parrochialem beati nicholaij de Abirdene situati et protesta
tus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Reditu quinque solidorum sibi et dicto
Altari debit' a longo tempore et non solut' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie inter terram thome prat ex orientali et
terram thome mar' ex australi ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terrram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam 3o
die huius processus Testibus Willelmo couper Roberto Walcar et Andrea
nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram procurator thome Waus et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu vj s' et Octo d' sibi annuatim
debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico virdi viridi inter terram thome
gledstane versus occidens et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et
terram ipsius thome ex australi et terram Agnetis gillespy ex boriali
ad quam terram acceden' nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o huius processus Testibus
Willelmo couper Roberto Walcar et Andrea nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens a barram dominus Robertus Waus capellanus
ac procurator altaris beate marie magdalene infra ecclesiam beati
nicholaij de Abirdene situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditu viginti solidorum sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de
quadam terra Agnetis giffarde vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex australi
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis blak ex orientali ex vna et
terram patricij Andirson' ex occidentali partibus ab altera ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringible preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in Sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Willelmo couper Roberto Walcar et Andrea nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad berram dominus Alexander club collector ac
procurator capellanorum collegij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quinque solidorum sibi capella
nis annuatim debit' de quodam antiquo horreo sue terra vasta thome culane
olim pertinen' Jacente ex orientali parte vie Regie qua Itur ad le
bolbrige inter terram quondam Johannis gothrasone ex australi
et croftum fratrum predicatorum ex boriali ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis
in Sacculo presentauit tanquam in Curia tanquam primo die huius
processus Testibus Willelmo couper Andrea Kennarty et Andrea
nachty sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Robertus Welschot
priorum locum tenens ac procurator fratrum predicatorum domus de Abirdene et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex s' et octo d' annuatim
dictis fratribus debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico Superiori ecclesie
inter terram thome prat ex orientali et terram thome mar' ex australi
et communiones vias regias versus boriam et occidens Ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus
Testibus Willelmo coupar Andrea Ka Kennarty and Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram frater Robertus Welschot prioris locum tenens ac procurator domus
fratrum predicatorum de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu octo
s' annuatim dictis fratribus debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem inter terram magistri Alexandri Cullan rectoris de Oyne ex australi ex vna et terram
Roberti Cullan ex boriali partibus ab altera et communiones vias regias versus oriens et occidens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis
in sacculo presentis in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Willelmo coupar Andrea
Andrea Kennartj et Andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Robertus Welschot
prioris locum tenens ac procurator fratrum predicatorum domus de Abirdene et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex s' de sibi et dicto
conuentui annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum
ex orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Ricardi Kintor ex
australi ex vna et terram capellanj altaris Sancti petrj ex boreali partibus
ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit in
Curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Willelmo coupar
Andrea Kennartj et Andrea nachtj sergeando

head.add: The gilde courte Anno Dominj et cetera nonagesimo quarto

div.p:
Curia balliuorum legalis de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem x die
octobris anno quo supra

Eodem die Andreas murray senior legittime vocatus respondere plegio super ipsum porrecto pro David
menyes pro iniusta postposicione et recusacione iiijxx li' pro redempcione piscacione dimidii
rethis de furdis et cetera non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo Dunbrek sergeando ad capiendum
districtum a dicto Andrea ad eundem ad plegium dimitti si petatur et ipsum Andream
hodie ad quindenam premunire tanquam secundo die huius processus videlicet ad xxiiijtum
diem mensis octobris

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit Androw nachty sergeand
to pas' and tak ane distress' fra Androw muresone and lat it agan
to borghe' and it be askit and warne him to Comper one monunday
that next cumis to ansuer' to Johne blak for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of xxvj s' as law will

The said day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander chamer
forspekar that gif Jonhne lammyntone one the next lauchfule day eftir
Jonhne Waus in futy cumis hame sal preyve sufficientlie that Adam
brone has forgevin him the vij s' g' and vij g' contenit in his
obligacion he is quyt of the saide Some And gif he falyeis
in the saide preyve he sal pay the saide money to the saide
Adam

the saide day Robert Kintor was in ane Amerciament of the court for the
wranguis' distrubulance of philp Dunbrek officiar' be ane
suorne assis' Alexander chamer forspekar and to Amend as law will
and forber' in tyme to Cum and Ande gif euir the saide Robert castis
furtht of his hous' or cumis out of his duellinge place
ony sic violent wattir or philtht he sal pay xxtj to
Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

Alexander Rede Alexander chamer the fadir sere Jonhne ruthirfurd Alexander menyes
Robert blinsele Jonhne of Culane
Jonhne Colisone thomas prat Alexander chamer the sone
Androw murray eldar Dauid mathesone
Androw Culan yongar Androw Culan eldar
William futhes Robert Crag
Alexander mar' Dauid mar' William blinsele

Eodem die Johannes Robertsone Johannes andirsone Richardus litstar
Alexander chamer thomas gardinar gilbertus riburne Willelmus goldsmyth
et Dauid Spens' Jurati fuerunt ad appreciandum carnes
et cetera pro anno Instanti

In the evin William verty and laurence talyour'
In the Crukit quartar Robert talyour' and Alexander lame
In he grene quartar mavnys and Richerd' talyour'

the saide day Alexander rede aldirman this yer' bigan and Androw Culan
yongar ane of the bailyeis presentit and deliuerit to the aldirman and balyeis
in the court thir acquitance vndir writin that is to say ane acquitance
of the lord erskine of jc li' j acquitance of the duk of montros'
of xl merkis j acquitance of xxtj merkis of the covntas of crafurd'
j acquitance of xxvj merkis of the blak freris j acquitance of x merkis
of the quhit freris j acquitance of v li' of the lard Drum for writhtis
ayris j acquitance of v li' of grantuly fra the Collectouris of Ald' Abirdene
xx s' for barbouris obeyt' j acquitance of v merkis of orknay
and ane acquitance of v li' of orknay and j acquitance of xiij merkis
of the comptrollar' quhilkis the common' clerk lokit in the common'
kyst in continent at the commavnd' of the saide aldirman and
balyeis
The saide say Robert Kintor was in ane Amerciament

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiijo
die Octobris anno quo supra

The saide day thomas prat come dettouris to Jonhne Colisone In the
nayme and behalf of Anthonius laurencij for Sevin li' v s' iiij d'
Scottis money

Eodem die Anthonius laurencij procurator relicte executorum ac tutorum quondam
Arnaldi vanstakinburghe opidanj de brugis et prolium suarum exhibuit
et deliberauit thome prat quondam Cirographum manualem subscripcione Johannis
Culane de summa quinque li' g' tanquam plegium pro septem li' et v s' et
iiij d' monete scocie pro quibus deuenit plegius Johanni Colisone Ipsium
thomam suum verum legittimum et Indubitatum substitutum fecit ad petendum exi
gendum et recipiendum dictam summam v li' g' et de receptis acquitandis
agendis defendendis promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma
procuratorij et cetera

The saide say Jonhne Colisone deliuerit to Anthone laurencij procurator
to the executouris of vmquhile Arnalde vanstakinburghe ale obligacionis
that euire he entromettit with pertening to the saide Anthone Ande the
saide Anthone dischargit and quiet'clamit the saide Johne of ale writis
and obligacionis that euire he hede of his excepit tua obligacionis
maid' be Robert Culane

The saide day Androu nachty sergeand at commavnd of the balyeis chergit
be his wande Jonhe litstar' to remane within the tolbutht quhile
he freide Richerd litstar' of viij li' and xx d' aucht to Jonhne andirson'

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the Consal and communite
present for the tyme grantit and assignit thar' nethir myll with the
multuris ande al profitis of the samyn to thar' commone Clerk
for ale the termes of threttene yeris for tene merkis yerlie to
be allouit in his fee Ande ordanit ane assedacion to be maid
to him tharapone vndir thar' commone Sell and to his assignais sub
tennentis and helpis Induellaris of the saide burghe' nay gretar thane
him self Entirand' tharto at this next martimes And' bigand'
vpmakinge and reparalinge the saide myll deuly as efferis and
lewand' hir' Soueraly biggit at the vschey of the said'
yiris thai beand' fre of the pament of the last terme becaus'
thai entirit in pament at the first terme of thar Entray

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the Consale and communite
present for the tyme grantit and assignit thar' vnar' myll with the
multuris and profitis of the samyn to Robert huchonsone Sangstar
for threttene yeris for xxtj merkis yirlie to be allouit in his
fee for gude seruice to be done eftir the tenor' of his letter
of band' Entirand' tharto at the terme of martymes next to cum
Ande ordanit ane assedacion vndir the commone sel to be maid'
die huius processus Testibus Willelmo Coupar Andrea nachty Kennarty et
Andrea nachty seriando
to him tharapone and to his assignais subtennentis and helpis nay gretar
thane him self Ande the saide Robert his assignais and subtennentis bigand'
vphaldinge and reparalinge the saide myll deuly as efferis Ande levand
hir' Soueralie biggit as the vsche of the saide yeris thai beand fre of
the pament of the last terme becaus' thai entirit in pament at the first
terme of thar' entray

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvij die
Octobris anno quo supra

The saide day Dauid menyes aldirman Robert blinsele Alexander Rede
Dauid mathesone James Colisone Jonhne menyes Androw branche
Johne Colisone thomas prat Johne Wormet Androw Culane
yongar Androw Culane eldar thomas mar' Alexander gray et Alexander nachty
grantit to sett Alexander chamer of murchill ane half nethis fischingis
of the Raik and the landis of the garrone with thar pertinencis for ale the
dais of his lyve alaneralie but ayris and assignez Ande that he
sulde haue ane assedacion vndir thar' commone sel The words 'Testibus prioris Carmelitarum Roberto Walcar' Andrea Scot Andrea nachty seriando' are written at the bottom of the page.
Ande eftir his deces' the saide demi nethis fischingis and landis to be at
in the tovnis handis vacand and frelie at thar' disposicion but ony
clame or Impediment of the saide Alexanderis ayris and assignais for
the quhilkis the saide Alexander sal pay tene merkis to the tone or
or his letter of assedacion be selit Ande siclik girssomes and
malys as vthiris pais forsiclik takis
Johannes baydenagh' notarius presens suj in premiss' teste
manu propria

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to patrik
baxtar nicholsone to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit one him be Androw
Culane yongar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of li s' et iiij d'

The said day the action movit be thomas prat agane the
Relict of Dauid' prat anent the tutory et cetera of hir' Sone and his
landis and gudis is continevit to this day viij dais in hoip of
concord without preiudice tile ony party

the saide day patrik baxtar nicholsone oblist him be the fatht
of his bodie to content and pay to gilbert menyes four' barellis
of Salmond' ful rede and Suet sufficient merchand gude
at mydsommir' next hereftir or within xv dais thareftir for redy
money takin fra him
